description:
Vagrant is a tool for building easy to create & configure ,reproducible and repeatable virtual development environment .With a simple Vagrant Up command you will able to install and configure the software & working environment is ready for you to work .Vagrant is a tool for managing virtual machines  by  simply using  Command  line interface and it is is written in Ruby.The course will teach you the followin 

- What is vagrant and why vagrant

- Install vagrant and virtual box in windows

- Manage VM

- Create and manage box

- Networking ,forward port , public & private network

- Manual and Automated provisioning

- Multiple provisioner

- Creating multiple vm and communicating between vm
title: Quick Vagrant
